properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
M/V EMMANRICK DISABLED AND ADRIFT
IN 18-10.85N 063-38.53W DUE TO
ENGINE FAILURE. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
PHONE: 59 659 673 1616 OR
U.S. COAST GUARD SAN JUAN,
PHONE: 787 289 2041.
